Media/Game

Voxel survival

Takes a minute to warm up, especially when you have a lot of mods, and especially especially when you’re doing this on Apple Silicon.

Welcome to the Minecraft Official Site | Minecraft

Launchers

The default launcher for Bedrock and Java is fine. Really. But you’ll need a launcher / instance manager if you go digging into mods frequently.

MultiMC

My default so far

MultiMC

PolyMC

fork of MultiMC. Main difference I’ve noticed so far is it connects to more mod sources.

PolyMC - Home

PolyMC/PolyMC: A custom launcher for Minecraft that allows you to easily manage multiple installations of Minecraft at once (Fork of MultiMC)
